description: Andrea Johnson  added  a photo and a video  ‚Äî with  Suzi Abramson-Johnson  and  4 others . Happy 10 months to Silas!  Poor thing has a cold so he wasn't feeling well for his photo shoot. The 1st pic you'll notice his onesie isn't all the way buttoned. He'll roll away from his diaper change before I can finishing buttoning him back up. 2nd pic shows how well he stands on his own. 3rd pic is what I do all day. Keep him from falling over the back of the couch. He can crawl on the couch, crawl up most of the back cushion and try and rip the blinds off all on his own. He's taking a few steps here and there, but he's figured out that he's a fast crawler. He keeps us very busy.

description: Andrea Johnson  added  a photo and a video  ‚Äî with  Suzi Abramson-Johnson  and  4 others . Silas is 11 months old today!  No belly sticker this month because they were ruined as a result of water damage from a fire in the apartment upstairs.  So today's photo shoot is in the hotel we're staying in.   He's pushing himself up to standing only using the floor. His record is 19 steps without falling. He has 3 teeth on the bottom and 2 are coming in on the top. He's finally starting to grow some more hair. Still into everything with drawers being his new favorite. He loves hanging out with dada before he goes to work. We can't believe he's almost a year old! Andrea Johnson Eric Johnson

I received so many compliments on the rehearsal dinner and I couldn't have done it without your help!   And a special thank you to my wonderful daughters,  Andrea Johnson , for food and wine planning and  Jennifer Kohn  for securing the beautiful party room, planning and final cleanup.  And thank you  Suzi Abramson-Johnson  and  Phil Johnson  for making the wine run and helping with cleanup.  Much Love  ‚ù§Ô∏è  and gratitude to you all! Samantha DiBaise
